snippet: Manager Mauricio Pochettino has accepted the recent criticism of his Tottenham Hotspur side following their early exit from the Champions League but said he saw "nothing wrong" in his team struggling to cope with their demanding schedule....

headline.main: Pochettino Sees 'Nothing Wrong' With Spurs' Struggles
headline.print_headline: Pochettino Sees 'Nothing Wrong' With Spurs' Struggles

lead_paragraph: Manager Mauricio Pochettino has accepted the recent criticism of his Tottenham Hotspur side following their early exit from the Champions League but said he saw "nothing wrong" in his team struggling to cope with their demanding schedule.

snippet: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has said striker Andy Carroll is nearing full fitness but is not yet ready to start for the club as he continues his recovery from a long-term knee injury....

headline.main: Bilic Ready to Unleash Carroll, but Only From the Bench
headline.print_headline: Bilic Ready to Unleash Carroll, but Only From the Bench

lead_paragraph: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has said striker Andy Carroll is nearing full fitness but is not yet ready to start for the club as he continues his recovery from a long-term knee injury.

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has been handed a one-match touchline ban for the second time this season after he admitted an improper conduct charge following his sending off at the weekend, the FA said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Mourinho Handed Second One-Match Touchline Ban This Season
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Handed Second One-Match Touchline Ban This Season

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has been handed a one-match touchline ban for the second time this season after he admitted an improper conduct charge following his sending off at the weekend, the FA said on Wednesday.

snippet: Liverpool goalkeeper Simon Mignolet believes a League Cup victory this weekend could instigate a period of sustained success for manager Juergen Klopp similar to the trophy-laden spell Jose Mourinho enjoyed during his first stint at Chelsea....

headline.main: Liverpool Cup Win Would Trigger More Success-Mignolet
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Cup Win Would Trigger More Success-Mignolet

lead_paragraph: Liverpool goalkeeper Simon Mignolet believes a League Cup victory this weekend could instigate a period of sustained success for manager Juergen Klopp similar to the trophy-laden spell Jose Mourinho enjoyed during his first stint at Chelsea.

snippet: Arsenal's Aaron Ramsey has been ruled out for four weeks with a thigh injury in a blow to the north London club's fading Premier League title hopes....

headline.main: Arsenal's Ramsey Out for Four Weeks With Thigh Injury
headline.print_headline: Arsenal's Ramsey Out for Four Weeks With Thigh Injury

lead_paragraph: Arsenal's Aaron Ramsey has been ruled out for four weeks with a thigh injury in a blow to the north London club's fading Premier League title hopes.

snippet: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes said his team are high on confidence as they look to frustrate Arsenal and come away from the Emirates Stadium with at least a point for the first time since winning promotion back to the Premier League in 2008....

headline.main: Stoke Hope to End Emirates Jinx on Saturday
headline.print_headline: Stoke Hope to End Emirates Jinx on Saturday

lead_paragraph: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes said his team are high on confidence as they look to frustrate Arsenal and come away from the Emirates Stadium with at least a point for the first time since winning promotion back to the Premier League in 2008.

snippet: Southampton must learn from errors committed during their 3-0 loss to Crystal Palace in the Premier League to avoid a Europa League exit in their next match, manager Claudio Puel said....

headline.main: Southampton Must Avoid Palace Errors for Europa Progress-Puel
headline.print_headline: Southampton Must Avoid Palace Errors for Europa Progress-Puel

lead_paragraph: Southampton must learn from errors committed during their 3-0 loss to Crystal Palace in the Premier League to avoid a Europa League exit in their next match, manager Claudio Puel said.

snippet: Chelsea were given a stiff examination by Stoke City at Stamford Bridge on Saturday before extending their lead at the top of the Premier League to nine points ahead of the late game between Liverpool and Manchester City....

headline.main: Chelsea Extend Lead at the Top, United Leave It Late
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Extend Lead at the Top, United Leave It Late

lead_paragraph: Chelsea were given a stiff examination by Stoke City at Stamford Bridge on Saturday before extending their lead at the top of the Premier League to nine points ahead of the late game between Liverpool and Manchester City.

snippet: The new Chinese owners of Wolverhampton Wanderers say promotion back to the Premier League is their top priority....

headline.main: Morgan Completes Sale of Wolves to Chinese Giant
headline.print_headline: Morgan Completes Sale of Wolves to Chinese Giant

lead_paragraph: The new Chinese owners of Wolverhampton Wanderers say promotion back to the Premier League is their top priority.

snippet: Juventus striker Alvaro Morata will only return to Real Madrid if he is guaranteed a starting role, he said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Morata Eyes Real Return, English Clubs Lurk
headline.print_headline: Morata Eyes Real Return, English Clubs Lurk

lead_paragraph: Juventus striker Alvaro Morata will only return to Real Madrid if he is guaranteed a starting role, he said on Tuesday.
